Every Thing i am is because of u !!
You are the first voice that ever sang to me .
At every turn you push me to be better .
You teach me to be true to myself.
When i look into ur eyes , Iam so proud .
I truly realize all the sacrifices u made to me .
My love for you goes beyond what i can say .
Happy mother's day :* <3

column1:
A brother is someone who hides my toys and break my dolls but he picks me up whenever i fall , someone who stands by my side and holds my hand when things don't go well , he helps me understand , someone who makes me funny faces to see how i'd react . I love u my brother and that's a fact 
Peter U are really missed .
There is no better friend than a sister and there is no better sister than u Sally my second mother :*
U are really missed too 
I love u both <3
God bless ur new life peter , I am happy for u :')
Maria&Andrew I  am very happy for having sister and brother in law like u both 
love u <3
Family<3
